name: nutrivibe-ai-testing
description: AI testing suite for NutriVibe nutrition platform using Groq

scripts.test:meal-plan: node -e "import('./test-groq-ai.js').then(m => m.testScenario({name: 'Meal Plan Generation', description: 'Test meal plan generation', prompt: 'Generate a 3-day meal plan for a Nigerian person wanting to lose weight', expected: 'Structured meal plan'}, 'meta-llama/llama-4-scout-17b-16e-instruct'))"
scripts.test:recipe: node -e "import('./test-groq-ai.js').then(m => m.testScenario({name: 'Recipe Recommendation', description: 'Test recipe recommendations', prompt: 'Recommend 3 healthy Nigerian recipes for weight loss', expected: '3 healthy recipes'}, 'meta-llama/llama-4-scout-17b-16e-instruct'))"

author: NutriVibe Team
